body:
Oh I see that. The type of the operands must always be the same, except for shift, in which case it's determined by the first, so let's say it's always determined by the first. You can see why it can be misinterpreted, right? I'd say:
*Arithmetic operators apply to numeric values of the same type.*
Then add a few words for the shift operator. Anyway your call. And sorry if I posted back here, I'm not familiar with the procedure for sending changes :)
